title: Was it the one who was pushing for Donald Trump's journey in Iri, Pennsylvania?
subtitle: Some said that the Craigslist Declaration had demonstrated that Trump should be paid to attend his gatherings, while others rejected it as a trick they intended to embarrass him. None of the allegations were true.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In October 2018, the Craigslist Declaration requested a paid attendance at the meeting of President Trump in Erie, Pennsylvania.
